title: ADina maTTukkum adaDA ungaL
sahitya:
ADina mattukkum nI AdaDA ungaL appA varaTTum appuramirukkudu vazhakkadu poruttiru


anupallavi

  adhikamAna kurumbu nannakai antarangamoDu toDarndu punnakai 
gati navanItam maNanda vAi vazhi tangum naghai pongum punnakai ingitam


caraNam    ADiya mayil tOghai marakata maNi shUDiya mayil tOghai vaNNam ponnum tulanga vanda 
shalangai maNi galIr galIr ena nIDiya shAyak-koNDai ashaindiDayum nizhal tarum balarAman
ishaindiDavum tEDi vanda annaiyAna ennai taDumAriDum vaghaiyAghina mighu mOhanan
